[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    Block(
        Braced {
            left_brace: Span(
                1,
                7,
            ),
            inner: [
                Expression {
                    expression: Variable(
                        SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: Span(
                                    1,
                                    9,
                                ),
                                name: "$a",
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                    ending: Semicolon(
                        Span(
                            1,
                            11,
                        ),
                    ),
                },
            ],
            right_brace: Span(
                1,
                13,
            ),
        },
    ),
]
